# remotemedia-sdk Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-10-27

## Active Technologies
- Rust 1.75+ (stable) (003-rust-grpc-service)
- In-memory execution state only (stateless service), configuration from environment variables/config files (003-rust-grpc-service)

- Rust 1.70+ (runtime), Python 3.9+ (SDK) (001-native-rust-acceleration)

## Project Structure

```text
src/
tests/
```

## Commands

cd src; pytest; ruff check .

## Code Style

Rust 1.70+ (runtime), Python 3.9+ (SDK): Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes
- 003-rust-grpc-service: Added Rust 1.75+ (stable)

- 001-native-rust-acceleration: Added Rust 1.70+ (runtime), Python 3.9+ (SDK)
